attributes.title: Virus!!!
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a Virus. All I wanted to do was keep up with what the RADICAL LEFT is doing to hurt our nation and it gave me a virus! Just a punch of nasty porn showing up on my phone! How disgusting!

attributes.title: Will not recommend this and it’s so bad
attributes.review: I was really had high expectation on this app but all it did is disappoint me and I had high expectations because it from Donald Trump 😡

attributes.title: Disappointment is an understatement
attributes.review: Took wayyyyyyyyyyy too long to download and made my phone lock itself everytime I tried to use it. It is wayyyyyyy to slow. I CANT NAVIGATE TO ANYTHING. WORST APP EVER!

attributes.title: My terrible experience
attributes.review: Horrible when I got on I saw a moldy old cheetoe 🤢 never again will I use this app again

attributes.title: Absolute garbage
attributes.review: This was an extremely awful experience. Hands down the worst thing to ever be created.

attributes.title: DONT GET IT
attributes.review: I just do like him. My phone won't work anymore. And things are getting airdropped to my phone. It's not worth messing your phone up

attributes.title: This app is Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and with in a few minutes a bunch of ads keeper popping up it was horrible I hate this app 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈😡😡😡

attributes.title: The TRUTH
attributes.review: This app SUCKS🤬🤬🤬don’t get this app!!!!! Do you guys actually think trump is a good guy?!!No. He is a terrible president. So unless y’all think Trump is a good guy/president, I REPEAT do NOT download this app unless you want to write a bad review!!

attributes.title: I only wanted to support my Cheeto...
attributes.review: I keep getting text messages from this app and it won’t stop, this is the worst app I’ve seen

attributes.title: Trash.
attributes.review:
I found this app racist, homophobic, misogynistic, and prejudice in every other way under the sun. Do NOT download. Please vote for Danny DeVito in the 2020 election. Trump will drive this country further into ruin I promise you. 

#DaddyDeVito2020
